result.title: Week #1
result.content:
Hello everyone,

Today, we solved some implementation problems and talked about Cumulative Sum and Greedy algorithms.

Here are the codes we wrote during the session:

A. Alyona and copybooks: https://ideone.com/czBAsc

B. ACM ICPC: https://ideone.com/SyZbtf, another solution using next_permutation: https://ideone.com/DwvYNf

C. Karen and Morning: https://ideone.com/dYDubX

D. Curriculum Vitae: using prefix and suffix sums: https://ideone.com/yA33Wn, using prefix sums only (cumulative sum): https://ideone.com/vi7rhJ

E. Cut Ribbon: https://ideone.com/QkUr7K

G. Worms Evolution â€” Hammouri's Edition: https://ideone.com/0FaZxr

  • There was a small mistake in the solution we wrote during the session, here you can find the difference: https://www.diffchecker.com/msRMP5CR

H. K-Palindrome: https://ideone.com/Y9lcV3

  • The second loop should go up to 26, not len as I wrote during the session.

M. Plug-in: https://ideone.com/O3WNoT

Finding a subarray with sum = K: https://ideone.com/sixoQB, another implementation: https://ideone.com/2vbjco

Resources:

Brute-force Search

Prefix Sum / Cumulative Sum

Greedy Algorithm

More problems will be added in two or three days. The next contest will be available on Friday morning inshaAllah.

Good luck!
